# Security Skill

## Purpose
Run abuse-first security analysis before implementation.

## Checklist
- Input validation and schema hardening.
- AuthN/AuthZ boundaries.
- Tenant isolation and RLS coverage.
- Rate limiting and anti-automation controls.
- Error-message safety and secret handling.

## Deliverables
- Threat scenarios.
- Mitigations mapped to files.
- Security regression tests to run.

## Exit Gate
No critical security gap remains untracked.
